verses.verse: {To the Director: A Davidic Psalm.} {A Prayer for Deliverance} d How long? LORD , will you forget me forever? {Or How long, Lord , will you forget me? Forever?} How long will you hide your face from me?
How long must I struggle in my soul at night and have sorrow in my heart during the day? How long will my enemy rise up against me?
Look at me! Answer me, LORD , my God! Give light to my eyes! Otherwise, I will sleep in death;
Otherwise, my enemy will say, "I have overcome him;" Otherwise, my persecutor will rejoice when I am shaken.
As for me, I have trusted in your gracious love, my heart will rejoice in your deliverance.
I will sing to the LORD , for he has dealt bountifully with me.
